verbs.description: [V: russell] [ARG1: crowe] reminisces about reuniting with his gladiator horse on robin hood after liam neeson said a horse from a previous movie remembered him on set of the ballad of buster scruggs russell crowe confirmed that the same thing had happened to him a horse from gladiator recognized him on the set of robin hood robin hood golfer horse buster scruggs twitter russell crowe robin hood liam neeson george
